Text: GDay MatesHey guys not sure if you are all still at this address or not but I wanted to get in touch and give you an update on where I am in case your email addresses chnaged I left San Francisco a couple of months ago and am now in Sydney Australia with my girlfriend working on the federal election campaign for the local Australian Liberal Party candidate Its been a great experience so far and a lot of fun Im planning on being back in school in September for an MBA if I can pull myself together and finish the applications Our apartmnet is nice and close to Bondi Beach and the Royal Sydney Golf Club so there are plenty of distractions Ill keep this short because Im not sure if it will reach any of you but if it does it would be reat to get a quick note back to let me know whats up Dorland I still owe you a tie by the way I hope everything is going well guys Matt Do You Yahoo Find a job post your resume
